languages.text: Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

traits.locale_text: Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

languages.text: Отключите плавное передвижение отряда в бою. Персонажи будут мгновенно перемещаться из клетки в клетку. Плавное движение можно временно возобновить, если по какой-либо причине активировано замедленное движение (например, при выполнении атаки по возможности).
languages.original_text: Disable your party smooth movement in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Smooth movement could be resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attack of opportunity).

languages.text: Schalte die kontinuierliche Bewegung deiner Gruppe im Gefecht aus. Die Charaktere bewegen sich ab sofort von Feld zu Feld. Die kontinuierliche Bewegung wird vorübergehend fortgesetzt, sollte aus irgendeinem Grund die Zeitlupe aktiviert werden (etwa wenn Gelegenheitsangriffe ausgeführt werden).
languages.original_text: Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

traits.locale_text: Schalte die kontinuierliche Bewegung deiner Gruppe im Gefecht aus. Die Charaktere bewegen sich ab sofort von Feld zu Feld. Die kontinuierliche Bewegung wird vorübergehend fortgesetzt, sollte aus irgendeinem Grund die Zeitlupe aktiviert werden (etwa wenn Gelegenheitsangriffe ausgeführt werden).

languages.text: Désactive les déplacements continus de votre groupe au combat. Les personnages se déplaceront instantanément de case en case. Le déplacement continu reprendra temporairement si le ralenti est activé pour quelque raison que ce soit (par exemple, en effectuant des attaques d'opportunité).
languages.original_text: Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

traits.locale_text: Désactive les déplacements continus de votre groupe au combat. Les personnages se déplaceront instantanément de case en case. Le déplacement continu reprendra temporairement si le ralenti est activé pour quelque raison que ce soit (par exemple, en effectuant des attaques d'opportunité).

languages.text: 跳过战斗中的移动动画效果，您所有的队伍成员会直接瞬移至目标格。如果由于某些原因（如角色移动触发了借机攻击）激活了慢动作，则会暂时恢复移动动画。
languages.original_text: Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

traits.locale_text: 跳过战斗中的移动动画效果，您所有的队伍成员会直接瞬移至目标格。如果由于某些原因（如角色移动触发了借机攻击）激活了慢动作，则会暂时恢复移动动画。

languages.text: Desactiva el movimiento continuo de tu grupo en combate. En vez de eso, tus personajes se moverán de una casilla a otra. El movimiento continuo volverá a aplicarse si se activa la cámara lenta por cualquier motivo (por ejemplo, por ataques de oportunidad).
languages.original_text: Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

traits.locale_text: Desactiva el movimiento continuo de tu grupo en combate. En vez de eso, tus personajes se moverán de una casilla a otra. El movimiento continuo volverá a aplicarse si se activa la cámara lenta por cualquier motivo (por ejemplo, por ataques de oportunidad).

languages.text: 戦闘中の部隊の連続移動を無効にし、キャラクターはセルからセルへと瞬時に移動する。何らかの理由でスローモーションが発動した場合（機会攻撃中など）、一時的に連続移動が再開される。
languages.original_text: Disable continuous movement of your party in combat. Characters will instantly move from cell to cell. Continuous movement will resume temporarily if slow motion is activated for any reason (e.g. while performing attacks of opportunity).

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中の部隊の連続移動を無効にし、キャラクターはセルからセルへと瞬時に移動する。何らかの理由でスローモーションが発動した場合（機会攻撃中など）、一時的に連続移動が再開される。
